author: Wolfgang Lonien
content: I've been there, walking the canyon - but that was during a time without cameras. It's definitely worth it if you ask me. There's a youth hostel about in the middle of the canyon, up the hill, which is a good starting point. Beware tho: what they call "easy walking" might surprise you - sometimes that path is about 45 degrees, and one side ends up some 400m lower ;-)
